r.d: This is a DataSource driver for Structures_DataGrid using CSV files.
r.n: - Request #8252: new option 'header' (boolean) that indicates whether the first row of the CSV file (or string) contains column names; these columns names are then also used as the DataGrid column names when the columns are auto-generated (thanks to Gregor Gramlich, gramlich at eosc dot de, for the patch)
